description: Encore Gigabit Ethernet PCI Adapter Card provides a networking speed of up to 1000Mbps and facilitates a smooth migration from Ethernet to Gigabit Ethernet. Fully compatible with 10BASE-T, 100BASE-TX and 1000BASE-T standard, ENLGA-1320 has one RJ-45 port to connect to a hub, switch or a router. It provides excellent network connectivity and is fully compatible with a 32-bit PCI local Bus. The Ethernet PCI Adapter Card features auto-negotiation, Full/Half duplex mode detection, plug-and-play installation and diagnostic LED. Install ENLGA-1320 in your computer equipped with PCI expansion slots; and your computer instantly becomes a high-bandwidth graphic or multimedia workstation. You can easily get the adapter running by using its plug-and-play installation. With its 32-bit bus master, this achieves high throughput and low CPU utilization. Use the Encore Gigabit Ethernet PCI Adapter Card to achieve the latest in computing style such as online gaming, office resource sharing, downloading large multimedia files and Internet surfing.
title: Encore Electronics Gigabit Ethernet PCI Adapter (ENLGA-1320)
